title: Boxing with Chris Mannix - How women’s boxing could someday surpass men’s boxing in popularity
itunes:title: Boxing with Chris Mannix - How women’s boxing could someday surpass men’s boxing in popularity
description:
Chris is joined by Jamel Herring and Kevin Iole to talk about the latest with Deontay Wilder, the huge weekend in women's boxing coming off the heels of Shields-Marshall and Taylor-Serrano, and should Devin Haney stay at 135 for Loma? #Volume #Herd #ColinCowherd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
